main event: Two PIPS of polarity were observed by GCI Radar, and two or three cylindrical objects were visually sighted moving in an erratic pattern at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The objects were confirmed by both radar and visual observations., The sighting duration was approximately 17 minutes., The radar indicated the objects were hovering and accelerating quickly., The objects were described as too short to be conventional aircraft., This sighting was part of a military report associated with Project Blue Book.
